column4: I am new to ubuntu but am a great fan so far.  I am looking for a fax utility that can fa from open ofice like XP does in office.   Does anyone suggest an application that they are a fan of.  Thanks.

I am new to ubuntu but am a great fan so far.  I am looking for a fax utility that can fax from open office like XP does in microsoft office.   Does anyone suggest an application that they are a fan of.  Thanks.
I don't know of such a utility. But there may well be one
